messages.subject: Valentine swap?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m in a season of lots of little hugs and lots and lots of helping and cleaning (10 yo, 5 yo, 4 yo, 2 1/2 yo and 1 yo!)and so don t have very much time to
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I'm in a season of lots of little hugs and lots and lots of helping
and cleaning (10 yo, 5 yo, 4 yo, 2 1/2 yo and 1 yo!)and so don't have
very much time to participate on list. Just resubbed and want to
thank members here...I so appreciate this community...wow, I come
here to laugh more often than not, as well as gain sage advice.

Am wondering if there are plans for a valentine card swap amongst the
children of your families this year? Hope everyone has a wonderful
week,

Warmly,
Peg Elbourn
Southern California
